meanings: (여럿 가운데서) distinguish[differentiate] (A from B), make a distinction (between A and B)
(음식 등을) be choosy, be fussy (about), (informal) be picky (about)
(보이지 않도록) hide, cover, (formal) conceal, screen (sth from sth), obscure, (보호하다) shield

vlive.korean: [달이 태양을 가릴 때] 마마무의 문별이었습니다, 안녕! ["Eclipse"] This was Moonbyul of MAMAMOO. Bye! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [VPICK! 주접특강] 마마무 문별 영역🐹 (MOONBYUL reading lovely comments)
